game_description: (CO-OP COMING SOON) Axe Throwing VR is an all-ages arcade VR exclusive with official Axe Throwing Rules and Gameplay AVAILABLE NOW FEATURES: - 3 MAPS (FARM/CITY ROOFTOP/SALOON BAR) - ACCURATE MECHANICS - EASY AND IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY
review_1: First thank you developers of this good game, I like it. More please , more new maps, more gameplay modes, more targets to aim . Option to review the trailer of path throwing action. Able to see and review the hand movement and axe trailer . Get more colorful targets, like balloons, apple, grass bottles. . . Please continue to add more contents if possible. Thank you
review_2: Very fun! Arcade style throwing with good physics. Would like to see multiplayer and more interactive environments!
